text:
22
PROGRAM OFFERING
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: STORIES *N STUFF
Type: Children!s stories, songs, etc.
Time: 30:00
No.: Continuous
Origin: WILL
Audience: Children
Serial Number: 53-1
Release Date: January 6, 1957
STORIES *N STUFF needs no introduction to NAEB stations. It is a prize-winning
children^ out-of-school program, honored at the Ohio State Institute for Education
by Radio and Television and at the Annual School Broadcast Conference.
Featured in the series are stories written especially for telling by John, Sue and
Carrie whose rompings are sure to delight the children. The stories deal with
science, fiction, other countries, nature, and good manners, but all are given
so as to instruct the child while entertaining him at the same time. Informative
and entertaining songs are also featured on each program.
